alert.note: Alert for Curry County; Roosevelt County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 26 at 5:29AM MST until January 26 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Curry County and Roosevelt County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on snow packed or icy road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
